ValidationRule.description: If (billing Id is 0 or null) - that is it is the subscription is unprovisioned - then if either city or street address 1 is null(empty) fail validation and print an error message.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" , OR((Billing_ID__c = 0), ISNULL(Billing_ID__c)), OR( LEN(City__c) = 0, LEN(Address_Line_1__c) = 0 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: New Subscriptions require a simple address. (Street Address 1 and City must both be provided.)
